docs.title: Jiemin Fang (方傑民)
docs.text:
I am a senior researcher at Huawei of the TopMinds program, working closely with Prof. Qi Tian, Dr. Lingxi Xie and Dr. Xiaopeng Zhang. I lead a small group that mainly works on 3D generation and neural rendering. My research interests also include representation learning, neural architecture design/search and AutoML.

I received my PhD and BE degree from the School of Electronic Information and Communications (EIC) at Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST) in 2023 and 2018 respectively, supervised by Prof. Wenyu Liu and Prof. Xinggang Wang.

If you are interested in intern/full-time positions at Huawei or any other collaboration with me, welcome to contact me via email.

Email | Google Scholar | GitHub | Twitter | DBLP

docs.title: News
docs.text:
• Oct. 2023 - Fast High Dynamic Range Radiance Fields for Dynamic Scenes is accepted to 3DV 2024!
  • Sep. 2023 - SA3D: Segment Anything in 3D with NeRFs is accepted to NeurIPS 2023!
  • Mar. 2023 - ResizeMix is accepted by Computational Visual Media.
  • Nov. 2022 - I lead the team to win the Gold Award in The 8th China International College Students’ “Internet+” Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition (ranking the 1st in the group of the industrial proposition track).
  • Aug. 2022 - TiNeuVox is conditionally accepted to ACM SIGGRAPH Asia 2022.
  • Jul. 2022 - I am honored to be awarded the HUST Academic Star (华中科技大学“学术新星”)!
  • Apr. 2022 - Our EfficientPose is chosen for the CVMJ 2021 best paper award.
  • Mar. 2022 - Two papers are accepted by CVPR 2022.
  • Jan. 2022 - BINGO is accepted by ICLR 2022.
  • Jul. 2021 - One paper is accepted by ICCV 2021.
  • Dec. 2020 - "FNA++: Fast Network Adaptation via Parameter Remapping and Architecture Search" is published in IEEE TPAMI.
  • Nov. 2020 - I have released a PyTorch toolkit dali-pytorch for accelerating ImageNet training with NVIDIA DALI. It improves the training speed dramatically with maintaining high performance.

docs.title: Competition Experience
docs.text:
• I led the team to win the Gold Award in The 8th China International College Students’ “Internet+” Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition (第八届中国国际“互联网+”大学生创新创业大赛) (ranking the 1st in the group of the industrial proposition track) in 2022.
  • I ever participated in RoboMaster Robotics Competition. I worked on embedded development and achieved the national second prize in 2017. Then in 2018, I led the team to win the national second prize.

docs.text:

  • National Scholarship for PhD Student, 2021
  • National Scholarship for Master Student, 2020
  • National Scholarship for Undergraduate Student, 2017
